text: Jorge Rubén Cortada SotoHabana Cultura (born 6 October 1984 in Isla de la Juventud, Cuba) is a Cuban actor and model. He is 190 cm (6ft 3in) tall.Libertad Digital == Biography == Rubén Cortada at the launch ceremony of the Jaguar XE in London (2014). He was born in Isla de la Juventud, Cuba, on 6 October 1984.Habana Cultura He graduated of High School levels in the Vocational School Vladimir Ilich Lenin, popularly known as ‘La Lenin’. Later, in 2003 he signs up for Automatic Engineering at the University Cujae, although he did not finish his studies in the Technical High School José Antonio Echeverría in La Habana. He started his international career as Model Lecturas He competed in tennis until he was fifteen. His first experiences as an actor were two plays in Cuba under Humberto Rodríguez’s command. After that, he trained with the Argentinian master Fernando Piernas (gambe). Currently, he lives in Spain. == Filmography == ===Series=== {| border="1" cellpadding="2" cellspacing="0" style="margin: 1em 1em 1em 0; background: #f9f9f9; border: 1px #aaa solid; border-collapse: collapse; font-size: 90%;" |- bgcolor="#CCCCCC" align="center" ! colspan="4" style="background: LightSteelBlue;" |TV Series |- bgcolor="#CCCCCC" align="center" !
